amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 116-200 to prohibit the repeal of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge oil and gas program until the Alaska Natives who live and work closest to the proposed oil and gas development in the Coastal Plain of ANWR are thoroughly consulted regarding the effect of the bill on their quality of life and future.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 116-200 to prohibit the repeal of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge oil and gas program until the Alaska Natives who live and work closest to the proposed oil and gas development in the Coastal Plain of ANWR are thoroughly consulted regarding the effect of the bill on their quality of life and future.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 526).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Young.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Young amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 526).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
